VI.i.2.B.1.d
.
Examples of Erroneous Payments That Are Not Duplicate Payments
Examples of erroneous payments that are
not
duplicate payments include
assigning an incorrect effective date for the addition of a dependent to a Veteran’s award
payment of benefits in an amount exceeding a beneficiary’s entitlement that is due to claims-processing delays, or
a decision that resulted in payment but is later found to be clearly and unmistakably erroneous.
title: M21-1, Part VI, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section B - Correcting the Erroneous Payment of Benefits to a Beneficiary
citation: Part VI, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section B
